entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.10.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.10.0

Bug Fixes

  • clean up single user page (cbfee2e)
  • tailwind fixes (4dd64aa)

Features

  • added error debug message in root layout (ac0db7a)
  • added option to filter no name people (0597f34)
  • added options to sort albums (020ef8a)
  • added people detail screen (e0dd1b9)
  • added storage drilldown in analytics (9139e82)
  • album info in header (8749d88)
  • albums page redesigned (ea38120)
  • bulk hide people from album page (1290831)
  • super charged albums page with people management tools (6b27686)

entry.title: New release for Immich Power Tools: v0.11.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Immich Power Tools 0.11.0

Bug Fixes

  • adapt to vertical resolution and fix flickering (8312fc1)
  • convert to vertical resolution (383b714)
  • thershold option and fix hide person (e0f96ce)

Features

  • add logo screen at start (7f359c1)
  • added google heatmap (842e323)
  • added preview in find (31e5879)
  • added rewind data (2b7dc94)
  • base setup for search photos (c0fec68)
  • updated UI for rewind. (37da0ed)

What's Changed

  • new logo scene and fix flickering by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/78
  • feat: Add 'Select All' button to Merge People page. by @jackbrown1993 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/88
  • feat: Clicking person name on thumbnail opens person in Immich by @jackbrown1993 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/90
  • fix: Refresh similar people after merge by @jackbrown1993 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/89
  • fix: threshold option and fix hide person by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/76
  • Fixed date list for missing location scenario by @knom in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/87
  • Added OpenStreetMap / Leaflet by @knom in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/91
  • feat: updated UI for rewind. by @sai80082 in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/79

New Contributors

  • @jackbrown1993 made their first contribution in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/88
  • @knom made their first contribution in https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/pull/87

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varun-raj/immich-power-tools/compare/v0.10.1...v0.11.0
